CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 14, 1953, pg. 27 reads: "Champion Bowlers - These three champion bowlers came out tops in their class last week in two city tournaments, bowling in interracial competitions. The women took part in Women's Ten Pin Association City Tournament at Brannan's Bowl in McKees Rocks.  Louise Fulton, left, beat a field of 204 women contestants to win the All Events title, trophy and cash.  Helene Williams, center, won the first place trophy and cash by winning the All Events competition in the "C" Division.  Pepper Davis, right, took part in the Singles Handicap Tournament last Sunday and emerged the winner. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Pepper Davis bowling with dark bowling ball, in Brannan's Bowl in McKees Rocks
